block.p: Mr. and Mrs. James P. Shea of New Milford, Conn., have announced the engagement of their daughter Megan Patricia Shea to Gavin Cyrus Cook, a son of Anita T. Cook of West Paris, Me., and the late Roy E. Cook. A June wedding is planned.

Ms. Shea, 31, and her fiance, 37, are English teachers at Choate Rosemary Hall, a preparatory school in Wallingford, Conn. She graduated from Bates College and received a master's degree in English from Middlebury College. Her father is the chairman of the history department at Canterbury School in New Milford. Her mother, Patricia T. Shea, is a saleswoman at Devoe Realty, a real- estate brokerage there.

Mr. and Mrs. James P. Shea of New Milford, Conn., have announced the engagement of their daughter Megan Patricia Shea to Gavin Cyrus Cook, a son of Anita T. Cook of West Paris, Me., and the late Roy E. Cook. A June wedding is planned.

Ms. Shea, 31, and her fiance, 37, are English teachers at Choate Rosemary Hall, a preparatory school in Wallingford, Conn. She graduated from Bates College and received a master's degree in English from Middlebury College. Her father is the chairman of the history department at Canterbury School in New Milford. Her mother, Patricia T. Shea, is a saleswoman at Devoe Realty, a real- estate brokerage there.

Mr. Cook, known as Cyrus, graduated from Bowdoin College and received a master's degree in liberal studies from Wesleyan University. His mother, now retired, was a teacher at the Monroe Elementary School in Lexington, Mass. His father was the deputy chief of the Lexington (Mass.) Fire Department.
